Package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace

Class HlsColorSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.color.ColorSpace
      • imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.HlsColorSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class HlsColorSpace
extends ColorSpace

    Implementation of HLS (hue/lightness/saturation) color space. See Sec. 13.2.3 of [1] for additional details. All component values are assumed to be in [0,1]. This is a singleton class with no public constructors, use getInstance() to obtain the single instance.

    [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).

    Version:
    2022/09/04
    See Also:
